title: ValueError: rate must be a scalar tensor or a float in the range [0, 1), got 1
body:
Code:
`!pip install -U --pre efficientnet`
`import efficientnet.tfkeras as ef`
`base_net=ef.EfficientNetL2(weights='noisy-student', include_top=False, input_shape= 
 (224,224,3),pooling='max')`


Error:
`---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-99-33389a53524a> in <module>()
----> 1 base_net=ef.EfficientNetL2(weights='noisy-student', include_top=False, input_shape=(224,224,3),pooling='max')

18 frames
/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_ops.py in dropout_v2(x, rate, noise_shape, seed, name)
   4421     if is_rate_number and (rate < 0 or rate >= 1):
   4422       raise ValueError("rate must be a scalar tensor or a float in the "
-> 4423                        "range [0, 1), got %g" % rate)
   4424     x = ops.convert_to_tensor(x, name="x")
   4425     x_dtype = x.dtype

ValueError: rate must be a scalar tensor or a float in the range [0, 1), got 1`
